description.value:
Frequency once per day

Energy bursts forth from your body. You deal @Damage[ceil(@actor.level/2)d6[@actor.flags.pf2e.elementalHeartDwarf.damageType]|traits:area-damage] damage to all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d6 damage.
